item.title: API Development & Integration
item.description:
In today’s interconnected digital landscape, your API is the silent engine driving your business. At Crafted Edge Solutions, we don’t just write endpoints; we architect robust communication layers that ensure your data flows securely and efficiently across platforms.

Building the Backbone of Your Ecosystem

Whether you are powering a consumer mobile app, an internal admin dashboard, or a third-party partner integration, our APIs are built for scale and reliability. We leverage modern frameworks like Django REST Framework and FastAPI to deliver high-throughput systems that can handle thousands of concurrent requests without breaking a sweat.

Our Core API Capabilities:

  • RESTful & GraphQL Architectures: We choose the right standard for your specific data needs, ensuring flexible and efficient querying.
  • Enterprise-Grade Security: Implementing OAuth2, JWT (JSON Web Tokens), and RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) to keep your sensitive data protected.
  • Automated Documentation: Every API we build comes with interactive Swagger/OpenAPI documentation, making developer handoff and third-party integration a breeze.
  • Performance Optimization: Utilizing Redis caching and asynchronous task processing to deliver sub-second response times.

Specialized for the African Context

We understand the unique challenges of the Kenyan and wider African markets. Our API designs are optimized for low-bandwidth environments and seamless local payment integrations.

  • Daraja (M-Pesa) Integration: Secure, callback-verified payment flows for your business.
  • SMS & USSD Gateways: Connecting your digital products to the majority of users who rely on non-smartphone interfaces.
  • Offline-First Strategies: Intelligent data synchronization protocols that ensure your mobile apps remain functional even when connectivity is intermittent.

Why Quality API Engineering Matters

A poorly designed API is a technical debt trap. Our approach focuses on versioning and maintainability, ensuring that your system can evolve without breaking existing clients. We believe that your backend should be a silent partner—always available, always secure, and always fast.

Discuss Your API Needs With Us

item.title: Custom Website Development
item.description:
Your website is more than just a digital brochure; it’s your primary business asset in an increasingly online world. At Crafted Edge Solutions, we specialize in building custom web applications that don’t just look great—they deliver results.

Precision Engineering Meets Modern Design

We move away from one-size-fits-all solutions. Our development process is a deep dive into your business’s specific needs, resulting in a bespoke digital presence that reflects your brand and meets your operational goals.

Our Web Development Arsenal:

  • Modern Frameworks: We utilize the latest in React, Next.js, and Django to build fast, secure, and maintainable applications.
  • Conversion-Centric UI/UX: Every pixel is placed with intent, focusing on intuitive navigation and clear calls to action (CTAs).
  • SEO & Search Visibility: We integrate search engine optimization (SEO) into the foundation of your site, ensuring your business is found by the right audience.
  • Extreme Performance: Using static site generation (SSG) and server-side rendering (SSR), we achieve Lighthouse scores in the high 90s, providing a near-instant user experience.

Tailored for Growth and Scalability

A website from Crafted Edge is built to grow with you. Whether you are starting with a single service or launching a complex platform, our architectures are modular and ready to expand.

  • Responsive to the Core: Your site will perform flawlessly on mobile, tablet, and desktop—ensuring you reach your users wherever they are.
  • Content Management Made Easy: We integrate user-friendly CMS options like Wagtail or Headless CMS solutions, allowing your non-technical team to update content with confidence.
  • Security as a Standard: From SSL configuration to secure data handling, we protect your brand and your users’ data with industry-best practices.

Elevate Your Online Presence

In the competitive Kenyan market, a slow or unoptimized website is a lost opportunity. We help you stand out with a professional, high-impact digital presence that establishes trust and drives business growth.

Start Your Web Project Today

item.title: ERP System Integration
item.description:
Efficiency in modern business operations starts with a unified view of your data. At Crafted Edge Solutions, we specialize in building the bridges that connect your Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems with the platforms your team uses every day.

Eliminating Silos and Automating Workflows

If your CRM, accounting software, and inventory management are not talking to each other, you are losing valuable time and increasing the risk of human error. Our integration services focus on streamlining your business logic into a single, cohesive ecosystem.

Our Integration Approach:

  • Custom Middleware & Connectors: We develop bespoke API bridges using Django and FastAPI to connect legacy ERPs with modern SaaS platforms.
  • Real-Time Data Visibility: No more waiting for end-of-day reports. Our integrations provide live dashboards and analytics that reflect your current business state.
  • Workflow Automation: We automate repetitive tasks between systems, such as syncing orders with inventory levels or triggering accounting entries from successful payments.
  • Scalable Architecture: We design our integrations to grow with your business, allowing you to add new modules and platforms without a total system overhaul.

Tailored for the Kenyan Business Landscape

We understand that local businesses have specific integration needs, from KRA iTax compliance to local banking and mobile money reconciliation.

  • Local Payment Gateways: Synchronize M-Pesa (Daraja) transactions directly with your accounting and ERP systems.
  • CRM & Marketing Automation: Connect your customer data with platforms like Mailchimp or custom AI Marketing Agents to drive sales.
  • Logistics & Supply Chain: Integrate with local delivery and warehousing partners for real-time order tracking and fulfillment.

The Value of an Integrated Business

An integrated ERP is not just a technical upgrade; it’s a strategic business feature. It reduces operational friction, provides actionable insights, and allows your team to focus on growth rather than data entry.

Optimize Your Operations with Us
